text:
@cjsnowdon @toadmeister Nicotine. Research done investigating pharmacology of nicotine suggests that it down regulates ACE2 receptor sites that Covid19 binds to.
Intensive care specialists in Wales called for trials of nicotine patches to evaluate the effect.
